definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to knock against/to bump into/to run into/to meet by accident
Large Hadron Collider (LHC) at CERN, Geneva, Switzerland
pinyin: Da4 xing2 Qiang2 zi3 Dui4 zhuang4 Ji1

sentences.english: The engineering of the electron-positron collider that we have completed also ranks among the world's most advanced technologies.
sentences.chinese: 我们的正负电子对撞机工程在全世界也是居于前列的。

sentences.english: Proving the existence of the Higgs boson is one of the main goals of the collider.
sentences.chinese: 而对撞机的工作就是要证实希格斯玻色子粒子的存在。

sentences.english: Help me out. Which ski cap says après-super-collider?
sentences.chinese: 帮我参考一下，哪顶滑雪帽比较像超级对撞机？

sentences.english: Purchase all upgrades for the Meson Collider.
sentences.chinese: 购买所有升级介子对撞机。

definition: Large Hadron Collider (LHC) at CERN, Geneva, Switzerland
pinyin: Da4 xing2 Qiang2 zi3 Dui4 zhuang4 Ji1

definition: neutrino (particle physics)/also written 微中子[wei1 zhong1 zi3]
European Organization for Nuclear Research CERN, at Geneva
